search.placeholder: What do you want to find?

footer.description: Inspiration for a journey to explore nature. Accompanying you to turn every trip into a memorable memory.

notfound.message_2: Sorry, we couldn't find the page. You will find many things to explore on Home.

password.min: Password must have at least 6 characters
password.max: Password must have at most 20 characters
password.different_current_password: New password must be different from current password

order-instruction.title: Order Instructions
order-instruction.step_1: Step 1: Create an account (if you don't have an account) or log in at the website
order-instruction.step_2: Step 2: After finding your favorite product, you can choose the quantity, color and click the Buy Now button (if you want to buy a product) or click the Add to Cart button (view and select more products other).
order-instruction.step_3: Step 3: In the shopping cart, you can change the quantity of products you want to buy by filling in the quantity box. Then continue pressing the Buy Now button.
order-instruction.step_4: Step 4: Please fill in all information according to the instructions, select payment method, then press the Checkout button.
order-instruction.step_4_des: Once the order has been successfully submitted, Horizon Camp's Sales Staff will contact you to confirm the information and proceed with the transaction.

note.title: Note
note.note_1: If you have any questions, you can contact the online sales department directly (by means of: email, phone).
note.note_2: To facilitate delivery, you need to write correct and complete information in the membership registration section.
note.note_3: Any orders missing any of the necessary information (full name, address, phone number) will be rejected without prior notice.
note.note_4: Orders that Horizon Camp considers invalid will also be rejected without prior notice.

delivery-and-receipt.title: Delivery and receipt products
delivery-and-receipt.content-title: Forms of transportation used at Horizon Camp

content_1.title: Express Delivery
content_1.des_1: Express delivery applies to orders within Can Tho city.
content_1.des_2: Shipping fees will be notified by staff when you place an order and request Express shipping.

content_2.title: Fast Delivery
content_2.des_1: Shipping time is 2-3 days depending on geographical distance and current objective conditions.
content_2.des_2: Shipping fees will be notified to you by staff when confirming the order.

content_3.title: Economy Shipping
content_3.des_1: Shipping time is 3-5 days depending on geographical distance and current objective conditions.
content_3.des_2: Shipping fees will be notified to you by staff when confirming the order.

policy.policy_1: Exchange or return items within 3 days if there are any manufacturer defects.
policy.policy_2: For distant customers, exchanges or returns are accepted within 3 days (from the time of receiving the goods) in case of manufacturer defects. The time for sending the product back to Horizon Camp must not exceed 14 days. Shipping costs will be 100% covered by Horizon Camp.
policy.policy_3: Products sent for exchange or return will not be accepted by Horizon Camp if they do not meet the conditions listed below. In such cases, customers will need to pay shipping fees for both sending the product back to Horizon Camp and for Horizon Camp returning the product to the customer.

conditions.title: Conditions for Exchange or Return
conditions.condition_1: Items must remain in their original condition, unused, with intact tags and labels.
conditions.condition_2: Not washed, ironed, dirty, or damaged.
conditions.condition_3: Return the product along with the purchase invoice.
conditions.condition_4: Within 3 days from the date of purchase.
conditions.condition_5: Only applicable for the same product but in a different color or size.

contact.title: Please contact us via the following information for exchanges:

intro.intro_1: Thank you for your interest in and access to our website. We respect and are committed to protecting your personal privacy.
intro.intro_2: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and (in certain cases) disclose your personal information.
intro.intro_3: Protecting personal data and building trust with our customers is very important to us. Therefore, we will use your name and other relevant information in compliance with this Privacy Policy. We only collect the information necessary for transaction processing.
intro.intro_4: We will retain customer information for as long as required by law or for a specific purpose. You can browse our website anonymously without providing personal details. In that case, we will not know who you are unless you log into your account.

content_1.title: Collection of Personal Information
content_1.des_1: We collect, store, and process your information for order processing and subsequent notifications related to your order, including some personal information: title, name, gender, date of birth, email, address, shipping address, phone number, fax, payment details, card payment details, or bank account details.
content_1.des_2: We use the information you provide to process your orders, provide services and information requested through the website, and fulfill your requests.
content_1.des_3: Additionally, we use this information to manage your account, verify and conduct online transactions, recognize website visitors, perform demographic research, and send information including product and service updates. If you do not wish to receive our marketing information, you may opt-out at any time.
content_1.des_4: We may transfer your name and address to a third party to deliver the goods to you (e.g., to couriers or suppliers).
content_1.des_5: Your order details are retained by us, but for security reasons, we cannot directly disclose them. However, you can access this information by logging into your account on the website. There, you can view your order details, received items, shipped items, and subscription details for newsletters, emails, and banking updates.
content_1.des_6: You commit to keeping your personal data confidential and not disclosing it to third parties. We bear no responsibility for password misuse unless it is due to our fault.
content_1.des_7: We may use your personal information for market research. All details will remain anonymous and used only for statistical purposes. You may opt-out at any time.

content_2.title: Security
content_2.des_1: We have appropriate technical and security measures to prevent unauthorized or unlawful access, accidental loss, destruction, or damage to your information.
content_2.des_2: We advise you not to share payment details with anyone via email. We are not responsible for any losses incurred by sharing your information over the internet or email.
content_2.des_3: You are strictly prohibited from using any program, tool, or other means to interfere with the system or alter data structures. It is forbidden to distribute, promote, or engage in any activities that disrupt, destroy, or intrude into system data. Violators will lose all rights and may face legal action if necessary.
content_2.des_4: All transaction information will be kept confidential. However, if required by law enforcement, we will be obligated to provide this information to the authorities.
content_2.des_5: The terms, conditions, and content of this website are governed by Vietnamese law, and the competent courts in Vietnam will have jurisdiction.

content_3.title: Customer Rights
content_3.des: You have the right to request access to your personal data, request corrections of any errors in your data at no cost, and request us to stop using your personal data for marketing purposes at any time.

general.description: The warranty policy at Horizon Camp is applied specifically to each product group and individual product.
general.return_policy: Exchange or return within 03 days for any manufacturing defects.
general.remote_customers: For remote customers, exchanges or returns are accepted within 03 days (from the time of receipt) for manufacturing defects. The shipping time to Horizon Camp should not exceed 14 days. Costs will be 100% covered by Horizon Camp.
general.other_products: For products not listed below, warranties are applied according to the specific product and its respective policy (refer to warranty duration on the product page). Please contact horizoncamp.support@gmail.com for more details.

official_products.title: Officially Distributed Products by Horizon Camp
official_products.description: For official products, customers encountering issues are advised to bring the product to any Horizon Camp store for warranty support. Alternatively, you can bring the product to the brand's warranty center for assistance.
official_products.note: Note: For officially warranted products, Horizon Camp acts as an intermediary between customers and manufacturers, representing customers to ensure their warranty rights. Horizon Camp does not decide the conditions or policies for warranties on officially distributed products.

warranty_process.title: Warranty Process
warranty_process.step2: The defect is reported to the manufacturer.
warranty_process.step3: Manufacturer accepts warranty: Horizon Camp notifies the customer and schedules a return appointment.
warranty_process.step4: Manufacturer rejects warranty (customer fault): Horizon Camp informs the customer and returns the product.
warranty_process.step5: Product covered by warranty is sent to the manufacturer for repair or conditional warranty.
warranty_process.step6: Horizon Camp receives the product back and sends it to a third party for repair (with or without a fee).

shoes.title: Footwear at Horizon Camp
shoes.manufacturer_defect: During the warranty period, all manufacturing defects will be repaired or replaced depending on the time and condition of the product.
shoes.user_fault: Defects arising during use that are not due to manufacturing will not be covered under warranty by Horizon Camp.
shoes.extended_support: From 3-6 months, Horizon Camp will assist customers with repair services for soles and adhesives.
shoes.note: Note: Products must be intact, without deformation or external physical damage, to be eligible for warranty.

bags.title: Backpacks and Bags
bags.coverage: Warranty Coverage: All stitching and zippers.
bags.conditions: Warranty Conditions: Product must be intact, with stitching unaffected by wear, breakage, chemical corrosion, or other factors.

decorative_lights.title: Decorative Flashlights
decorative_lights.conditions: Warranty Conditions: No breakage, short-circuits, drops, or physical damage.
decorative_lights.support: Support: Horizon Camp will assist with repairs depending on the extent of the damage.

handheld_headlights.title: Handheld and Headlamps
handheld_headlights.manufacturer_defect: Warranty Coverage: No external factors or user misuse (especially for LEDs and circuits).
handheld_headlights.no_coverage: No warranty for cases of: drops, abrasion, chemical damage, water ingress, or oxidation.
handheld_headlights.support: Support: Horizon Camp assists with part replacement depending on the case, with costs borne by the customer.

camping_lights.title: Camping Lights and Other Lights
camping_lights.conditions: Warranty Conditions: No breakage, short-circuits, drops, or physical damage.

foldable_chairs.title: Foldable Chairs
foldable_chairs.manufacturer_defect: Warranty Conditions: No external factors or misuse of the product.
foldable_chairs.no_coverage: No warranty for cases of: misuse of product functions or tearing of chair fabric.
foldable_chairs.support: Support: Horizon Camp assists with part replacement depending on the case, with costs borne by the customer.

foldable_tables.title: Foldable Tables
foldable_tables.manufacturer_defect: Warranty Conditions: No external factors or misuse of the product.
foldable_tables.no_coverage: No warranty for cases of: misuse of product functions or exceeding allowable weight limits.

tents.title: Camping Tents
tents.conditions: Warranty Conditions: No warranty for cases of external factors or misuse of the product.
tents.support: Support: Horizon Camp assists with part replacement depending on the case, with costs borne by the customer.

portable_stoves.title: Portable Gas Stoves
portable_stoves.conditions: Warranty Conditions: No external factors or misuse of the product.
portable_stoves.support: Support: Horizon Camp assists with part replacement depending on the case, with costs borne by the customer.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.sub-title: If you have any questions, feel free to send us your request, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

form.title: Contact Information
form.description: Please fill out the form below and send us your message. We will respond to you as soon as we receive it.

intro_1.title: Our Story
intro_1.description: With the philosophy "Living is experiencing. Living is enjoying," Horizon Camp was born with the mission of helping travelers with an endless love for nature have the opportunity to live and immerse themselves in the vast and magnificent spaces. This is also the core value that sparked the idea of Horizon Camp, shaping it and eventually bringing it to life to reach millions of customers.

intro_2.title: Our Vision
intro_2.description: With the desire to become a trusted destination in the travel and adventure community, Horizon Camp strives to provide the most suitable products for every customer, along with useful advice on those products. In-depth research on market demands as well as the field of tourism and outdoor activities is what Horizon Camp is steadfastly pursuing to establish its credibility in the eyes of customers. Always aiming to project a trustworthy, friendly, and professional Horizon Camp.

intro_3.title: Why Do Customers Choose Horizon Camp?
intro_3.description: "For Customers - By Customers - Because of Customers" is the foundation for the element 'Your' in the name Horizon Camp. Our mission cannot be fulfilled if your experiences are not complete. To achieve this, Horizon Camp has undergone a rigorous selection process to offer high-quality products that are suitable and sourced from the most reputable manufacturers.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.sub_title: Please send us your question by emailing us or simply fill out the form on the

questions.question: Why is my password not accepted?
questions.answer: We are sorry, but there seems to be an issue with your password. It may be too weak or not meet our password requirements. Please reset your password through the My Account section on our website.

questions.question: What if I forget my password?
questions.answer: Don't worry, we will still have your email address and other details in our system. Please go to the My Account section on our website, select the forgot password option, and follow the steps to reset your password.

questions.question: Can I close my online account?
questions.answer: Yes, you can simply go to the My Account section and follow the steps to delete your online account in the Delete Account section.

questions.question: How do I return an item to the store?
questions.answer: You can find all the information related to returning items to us on the Returns Policy page.

questions.question: How long can I keep an order before returning it?
questions.answer: You have 3 days to notify us of the items you wish to cancel from the time you receive the order, and then another 3 days to return the items to us.

questions.question: What if my item is faulty?
questions.answer: If you suspect that your item may be faulty, please let us know immediately by bringing the product to your local Horizon Camp store or contacting our customer care team. We will try to resolve any issue with a faulty item as quickly as possible, but we need you to notify us as soon as you notice the problem.

questions.question: Can I cancel my order?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your order if it has not yet been handed over to the courier.

questions.question: Can I change my order?
questions.answer: You can change your information or order if it has not yet been handed over to the courier by canceling the order and placing a new one. However, if the order has been accepted into our system, we regret that we cannot make any changes, including updates to billing/shipping address, products, payment methods, or delivery services.

questions.question: How do I use a discount code?
questions.answer: Once you've added items to your cart, you can choose the delivery method and then enter the discount code before proceeding to checkout. Please make sure you enter the code correctly and then click 'Apply'. This will refresh the cart page and display the discount. If the code is invalid, a red notification will appear at the top of the page, and the discount will not be applied. Some products may be excluded from promotional discounts.

questions.question: I want to buy in bulk. Can I get a discount?
questions.answer: If you have any inquiries related to bulk purchases, please contact our group sales team for assistance.

questions.question: Did you receive my order?
questions.answer: Once you've entered your order, delivery details, and payment, you'll be prompted to click 'Complete Order'. It may take a few minutes for the payment to be authorized, and your screen will automatically refresh to display your order number and confirmation. You will also receive an email shortly after to confirm your order. If you haven't received an email, please check your spam folder. If you still haven't received confirmation, it's unlikely that we've received your order. Please contact us if you'd like us to check.

questions.question: How do I know when my order has been received?
questions.answer: After completing the checkout process, you will be provided with an order reference number, and we will send you a confirmation email to your registered email address. The email will detail your order with the reference number, products, and total order value. Please keep the reference number for any queries regarding your order. If you haven't received an email, check your spam folder. If your order status is 'Processing,' it means we have received your order and are preparing to ship it.

questions.question: I'm looking for an item on the website, but it isn't listed. Can I order it?
questions.answer: Unfortunately, we can only place orders for items that are listed on our website.

questions.question: Can you let me know if you're getting an item back in stock?
questions.answer: We cannot inform you when a product will be restocked. However, as soon as it becomes available, it will appear on our website for purchase.

questions.question: Do you deliver internationally?
questions.answer: Currently, we do not deliver internationally. We only offer delivery within Vietnam and the ability to reserve an item for collection in-store.

questions.question: Can I track my order?
questions.answer: Yes! Simply follow the link in your email, and our service provider will inform you of the expected delivery time.

questions.question: Where is my order?
questions.answer: You can track your order online using our tracking service. Just follow the link in your email or the My Account section on our website. Our service provider will let you know the expected delivery time. In case of any issues with your order, we will contact you via phone or email. However, if you have any concerns, please contact our Customer Care Team.

questions.question: I received my item, but it was damaged. What should I do?
questions.answer: We are truly sorry for that! Please contact our Customer Care Team as soon as possible, and they will review the issue for you.

questions.question: I received my item, but it was faulty. What should I do?
questions.answer: We are truly sorry for that! Please follow the instructions in your delivery note on how to return the item to our warehouse, and our Returns Team will review the issue for you. Alternatively, you can return your item to one of our stores. Use our Store Finder to locate the nearest branch and bring your delivery note so a member of our Retail Team can assist you further. If you wish to discuss your faulty item beforehand, please contact our Customer Care Team.

questions.question: Can I place an order over the phone?
questions.answer: Yes, please call us at 0123 456 789 to speak to one of our customer advisors, who will be happy to take your order and advise you on our products.

questions.question: How do I contact Customer Care?
questions.answer: If your question is not listed in our help center, please email us at horizoncamp.support@gmail.com.

questions.question: What is your address?
questions.answer: Please use the following address for inquiries and complaints: Khu 2, Đường 3/2, Phường Xuân Khánh, Quận Ninh Kiều, Thành phố Cần Thơ.

questions.question: Why isn't my discount code working?
questions.answer: Check that you have entered the code exactly as provided, including any special characters. Some products may be excluded from promotional discounts, and you can find details about this on the Terms and Conditions page. If you're still having trouble and received the code from a third party, the offer or discount may have expired.

activate-account.title: Activate Account

message.msg_1: Congratulations! You have successfully registered an account at Horizon Camp with the email {{email}}.
message.msg_2: To log in and use our services, please activate your registered account.
message.msg_3: Note: If the account is not activated within 1 day, the system will automatically cancel (delete) your account.
message.msg_4: We have sent an activation code to the email {{email}}. Please check your inbox.

msg_5.note_1: The activation code is valid for 10 minutes only.
msg_5.note_2: If you did not receive the code or the code has expired, you can request a resend. If you still do not receive the code after requesting a resend, please verify the accuracy of the email you registered and try again.

message.msg_6: Please enter the activation code here. If you have not received the code,

activate-account.congratulations: Congratulations, you have successfully activated your account!

intro_1.title: Quality Assurance
intro_1.description: Meeting the needs of travel and camping with large quantities

delete-account.title: Delete Account

confirmation.confirm_0: You are requesting to delete your account. Please note that:
confirmation.confirm_1: All your personal information, orders, and transaction history will be permanently deleted.
confirmation.confirm_2: Once the account is deleted, you will not be able to recover any data.
confirmation.confirm_3: If you have any pending orders, they will be canceled and cannot be completed.
confirmation.isAgreed: Yes, I want to permanently delete this account and all its data.

delete-account.confirm_message: Please enter your account password to confirm deletion:
delete-account.finish_confirm: Deleting an account cannot be restored. Are you sure you want to delete your account?

qualified.warning_2: Please complete all of these forms before deleting your account.
